name: Globe Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A file with the .purge extension has been encrypted and renamed by Globe ransomware . It could be an encrypted image, video, document, database, or other type of file. Because the file is encrypted, you cannot open it. The .purge extension is added to the file's normal extension, producing an extension like .jpg.purge .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
